text: Trainee Corporate Insolvency & Restructuring Administrator. Our client, a Boutique Corporate Insolvency Practice are seeking a conscientious and ambitious Trainee Corporate Insolvency & Restructuring Administrator to join their established Corporate Insolvency/Corporate Recovery department. Suitable for a recent Graduate or similar, and candidates with an interest for or experience in accountancy, finance, insolvency and corporate finance, this is a specialist role within the Corporate insolvency/recovery department, wherein you will be involved in both Liquidation and Administration case administration. Full training is provided and the role offers the opportunity for further study and progression. Key responsibilities will include: Ensure all aspects of CVL and Administration cases are progressed efficiently. Ensure all corporate cases are compliant in accordance with regulatory requirements. Review all communication to ensure it meets all company standards. Maintain appropriate records of chargeable time spent on case work. Attend and assist at meetings both in and out of the office when required. Participate in internal and external marketing events when required. An amazing opportunity to join an incredibly well regarded insolvency practice during an exciting period of growth and development within the insolvency sector. Salary £16, 000 to £20, 000.
